3: Roland, have you seen Lamia?
No. Why are you looking for her?
I just want to check on everyone's condition at all times. Lamia is not that stable, and I worry that she will do something strange.
It'll be okay. Besides, she's used to being alone.
Aren't you going to end this female, Roland?
Keep it this way for now. I don't want to lose this beautiful sample yet.
Hey, what did you say?
The park is now deserted, and in the empty corner, Nanami plays in the water while she makes fun of the machine in front her.
Nanami doesn't want to work yet! No! Nanami didn't want to work from the beginning!
Work itself represents failure! You get it?
Faced with a lecture from Nanami, the machine is motionless, and makes no indication.
In the end, Nanami can't think of any more excuses to use, and the machine finally moves.
Nanami, it is now...
Nanami can't hear you! Can't hear you!
Nanami rolls on the ground like a child throwing a tantrum. The frame has not had its strength adjusted and shatters the floor.
I have no power to stop you either, but Nanami, you have to remember to do what you should do.
I know!
Nanami keeps the lying-down pose as she turns her back to the machine and complains.
Anyway, Nanami wants to keep running away, so you guys don't follow me!
